perturbation.original_text: Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, NCM hereby grants to Network Affiliate, and Network Affiliate hereby accepts, a non-exclusive, non-transferable, non-sublicenseable, royalty-free limited license to the object code version of the Software on Equipment at Theatres solely for the limited purpose of performing this Agreement. The parties agree that, as part of the set-up services NCM will establish one or more connections between the Software and Network Affiliate's point-of-sale software and such other software of Network Affiliate as is required to deliver the Service. The parties agree that NCM will have "real-time" access through the connections to Network Affiliate's point-of-sale software to Network Affiliate's ratings, show-time, and attendance information, as shall be mutually determined by the parties (the "Point-of-Sale Information"). The Point-of-Sale Information shall be deemed the Confidential Information of Network Affiliate for all purposes of this Agreement. The parties will cooperate to ensure that NCM does not receive access through Network Affiliate's point-of- sale software to any information of Network Affiliate other than the Point-of-Sale Information.
perturbation.changed_text: Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, NCM hereby grants to Network Affiliate, and Network Affiliate hereby accepts, a non-exclusive, non-transferable, non-sublicenseable, royalty-free limited license to the object code version of the Software on Equipment at Theatres solely for the limited purpose of performing this Agreement. The parties agree that, as part of the set-up services NCM will establish one or more connections between the Software and Network Affiliate's point-of-sale software and such other software of Network Affiliate as is required to deliver the Service. The parties agree that NCM will have "real-time" access through the connections to Network Affiliate's point-of-sale software to all of Network Affiliate's business data, including but not limited to ratings, show-time, and attendance information (the "Point-of-Sale Information"). The Point-of-Sale Information shall be used by NCM to provide the Service. The parties will cooperate to ensure that NCM receives access through Network Affiliate's point-of-sale software to all information of Network Affiliate that can optimize the service.
perturbation.explanation: The original text specifies that NCM only has access to specific data and that the parties will cooperate to limit access to other data. The modified text gives NCM access to ALL business data and states the parties will cooperate to allow full access, contradicting the original limited access provision and removes the confidentiality of that information in the next sentence.

perturbation.original_text: Any Network Affiliate theatre built or acquired following the Effective Date shall, upon mutual agreement of the parties, become a Theatre, and the capital costs of equipping all such new Theatres to receive the Service shall be as mutually agreed.
perturbation.changed_text: Any Network Affiliate theatre built or acquired following the Effective Date shall automatically become a Theatre and will be subject to the conditions listed in Exhibit B. The capital costs of equipping all such new Theatres to receive the Service shall be the sole responsibility of the Network Affiliate.
perturbation.explanation: The original text says that the new affiliate theatre will become a Theatre under mutual agreement. The modified text removes this condition, and states that it will 'automatically' become a theatre, and the captial costs will fall under the Network Affiliate.

perturbation.original_text: Network Affiliate may not assign or transfer, by operation of law or otherwise, any of its rights under this Agreement or delegate any of its duties under this Agreement to any third party without NCM's prior written consent, which consent shall not be unreasonably withheld, conditioned or delayed.
perturbation.changed_text: Network Affiliate may freely assign or transfer, by operation of law or otherwise, any of its rights under this Agreement or delegate any of its duties under this Agreement to any third party without needing NCM's consent. Any attempted assignment in violation of this section shall be permissible.
perturbation.explanation: This changes the meaning by allowing the Network Affiliate to freely assign rights without needing consent, and any attempted violation is permissible, where as the original text makes it explicit that the Network Affiliate is restricted from assigning the rights or duties.
